name: SphereRoll
description:
A platform game where you can race your friends to the finish line.

Controls

Player 1:  Move - WASD  |  Shoot - F  |  Jump - Space

Player 2:  Move - IJKL  |  Shoot - ' ; '  |  Jump - ' . '

Gameplay

Your shooting indicator will automatically lock onto the turrent when you're in range, so don't worry about aiming!

The aim is to reach the goal at the end of each level, beat your friends to the finish!
